trans-unit.source: Enabling and Configuring Storage Analytics
trans-unit.target: Enabling and Configuring Storage Analytics

trans-unit.source: This topic describes how to enable and configure Storage Analytics for a storage service.
trans-unit.target: This topic describes how to enable and configure Storage Analytics for a storage service.

trans-unit.source: Enabling Storage Analytics
trans-unit.target: Enabling Storage Analytics

trans-unit.source: To use Storage Analytics, you must enable it individually for each service you want to monitor.
trans-unit.target: To use Storage Analytics, you must enable it individually for each service you want to monitor.

trans-unit.source: You can enable it from the <externalLink><linkText>Azure Management Portal</linkText><linkUri>https://manage.windowsazure.com/</linkUri></externalLink>; for details, see <externalLink><linkText>How To Monitor a Storage Account</linkText><linkUri>http://www.windowsazure.com/manage/services/storage/how-to-monitor-a-storage-account/</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: You can enable it from the <externalLink><linkText>Azure Management Portal</linkText><linkUri>https://manage.windowsazure.com/</linkUri></externalLink>; for details, see <externalLink><linkText>How To Monitor a Storage Account</linkText><linkUri>http://www.windowsazure.com/manage/services/storage/how-to-monitor-a-storage-account/</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: You can also enable Storage Analytics programmatically via the REST API or the client library.
trans-unit.target: You can also enable Storage Analytics programmatically via the REST API or the client library.

trans-unit.source: Use the <link xlink:href="96701530-7f68-4933-864a-3c019b00288f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Blob Service Properties (REST API)</link>, <link xlink:href="9e42d151-d7eb-40fb-b3ef-ee1b57f83f0f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Queue Service Properties (REST API)</link>, and <link xlink:href="99806684-7d33-4a59-acc2-23aaf460eb31" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Table Service Properties (REST API)</link> operations to enable Storage Analytics for each service.
trans-unit.target: Use the <link xlink:href="96701530-7f68-4933-864a-3c019b00288f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Blob Service Properties (REST API)</link>, <link xlink:href="9e42d151-d7eb-40fb-b3ef-ee1b57f83f0f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Queue Service Properties (REST API)</link>, and <link xlink:href="99806684-7d33-4a59-acc2-23aaf460eb31" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Table Service Properties (REST API)</link> operations to enable Storage Analytics for each service.

trans-unit.source: The following example will enable Storage Analytics for the Table service of a fictional account named <legacyItalic>myaccount</legacyItalic>.
trans-unit.target: The following example will enable Storage Analytics for the Table service of a fictional account named <legacyItalic>myaccount</legacyItalic>.

trans-unit.source: Configure your request URI and headers to match the following examples.
trans-unit.target: Configure your request URI and headers to match the following examples.

trans-unit.source: The HTTP method is PUT, and you must apply an authentication scheme to sign the request.
trans-unit.target: The HTTP method is PUT, and you must apply an authentication scheme to sign the request.

trans-unit.source: For more information about signing your request, see <link xlink:href="96cec7bc-63cc-4227-920a-dddd850433c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authentication Schemes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about signing your request, see <link xlink:href="96cec7bc-63cc-4227-920a-dddd850433c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authentication Schemes</link>.

trans-unit.source: Your request also needs a request body, consisting of XML that the storage service will process and use to configure Storage Analytics.
trans-unit.target: Your request also needs a request body, consisting of XML that the storage service will process and use to configure Storage Analytics.

trans-unit.source: The following example enables logging for delete and write requests and sets a retention policy of 7 days.
trans-unit.target: The following example enables logging for delete and write requests and sets a retention policy of 7 days.

trans-unit.source: It also enables metrics, excludes API-level summary statistics, and sets a retention policy of 7 days.
trans-unit.target: It also enables metrics, excludes API-level summary statistics, and sets a retention policy of 7 days.

trans-unit.source: When this request is sent, it will receive a response that will indicate whether or not Storage Analytics was configured.
trans-unit.target: When this request is sent, it will receive a response that will indicate whether or not Storage Analytics was configured.

trans-unit.source: If the response has an HTTP status code of 202 (Accepted), your Storage Analytics settings have been updated.
trans-unit.target: If the response has an HTTP status code of 202 (Accepted), your Storage Analytics settings have been updated.

trans-unit.source: The following example response indicates that our settings were updated:
trans-unit.target: The following example response indicates that our settings were updated:

trans-unit.source: After you have enabled Storage Analytics with your initial configuration, you can always get your current settings by calling the <link xlink:href="96701530-7f68-4933-864a-3c019b00288f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Blob Service Properties</link>, <link xlink:href="99806684-7d33-4a59-acc2-23aaf460eb31" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Table Service Properties</link>, or <link xlink:href="9e42d151-d7eb-40fb-b3ef-ee1b57f83f0f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Queue Service Properties</link> operation.
trans-unit.target: After you have enabled Storage Analytics with your initial configuration, you can always get your current settings by calling the <link xlink:href="96701530-7f68-4933-864a-3c019b00288f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Blob Service Properties</link>, <link xlink:href="99806684-7d33-4a59-acc2-23aaf460eb31" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Table Service Properties</link>, or <link xlink:href="9e42d151-d7eb-40fb-b3ef-ee1b57f83f0f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Queue Service Properties</link> operation.

trans-unit.source: Updating Storage Analytics
trans-unit.target: Updating Storage Analytics

trans-unit.source: If you want to change your Storage Analytics settings for a storage service, call the <link xlink:href="65424a3c-ab49-4994-865c-827409598092" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Blob Service Properties</link>, <link xlink:href="aff6740b-6ea5-4548-b226-322eb76dad94" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Table Service Properties</link>, or <link xlink:href="3ed99e96-b502-4543-9692-3c48343eeb2d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Queue Service Properties</link> operation again.
trans-unit.target: If you want to change your Storage Analytics settings for a storage service, call the <link xlink:href="65424a3c-ab49-4994-865c-827409598092" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Blob Service Properties</link>, <link xlink:href="aff6740b-6ea5-4548-b226-322eb76dad94" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Table Service Properties</link>, or <link xlink:href="3ed99e96-b502-4543-9692-3c48343eeb2d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Queue Service Properties</link> operation again.

trans-unit.source: Ensure that your new XML request body retains your desired configuration options, such as enabling/disabling Storage Analytics and/or a retention policy for the service.
trans-unit.target: Ensure that your new XML request body retains your desired configuration options, such as enabling/disabling Storage Analytics and/or a retention policy for the service.

trans-unit.source: Each time one of these operations is called, it changes the applicable service’s settings immediately.
trans-unit.target: Each time one of these operations is called, it changes the applicable service’s settings immediately.
